dct_description_sm: Map shows districts by color code, street names, public buildings, railways and tram routes. Include a list of abbreviations. In lower left margin: "De venta en la Libreria Internacional de Romo y Füssel." Buildings are numbered. The library does not have the companion text to identify them. East Decimal Degree -3.666667. South Decimal Degree 40.400000. North Decimal Degree 40.450000. West Decimal Degree -3.716667. Romo y Fussel.
